title: Online backup storage | Online collaboration
description: Trainbit secure online backup storage and online collaboration storage by email and browsers from anywhere that you keep your files ,photos ,documents ,software and others and also you can share them with other people
cleaned_text: - Fast Upload Upload your files up to 2 GB and share them with other poeple to download them directly. - Upload via E_mail You can send your emails to Trainbit to upload email attachment, it let`s you get a back up from your photos and documents. - Upload via URL You can easily upload your files by entering their URL - Direct Download Manage your files and search among them wherever and whenever you would like. - Download Statistics Let`s see and analyze your download statistics to know how many poeple from which countries download your files. - Free Permium Account As you can share your files with other poeple you can also earn some points by each download and become premium user by the points you`ve got before.
